No Deal No AGO.description: Pledge to not cross the picket line of over 400 Art Gallery of Ontario (AGO) workers on strike for better hours, liveable wages, and a future at the gallery.

House of Commons petition e-4905.description: Petition calling upon the Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship to ensure Canadians in Gaza can seek refuge in Canada and expanding access to temporary resident visas, and implement a visa program akin to CUAET for Palestinians.

Ontario Trans I.D. resources.description: Documents and resources I've collected for changing your name and/or gender marker with governmental bodies and services in Ontario

Justice Trans.description: Justice & legal info for Two Spirit, trans, non-binary, and gender non-conforming individuals in Canada

National Network of Abortion Funds.description: Network of 100 independent abortion funds working to remove financial and logistical barriers to abortion access

Digital Transgender Archive.description: Archive of digitized and born-digital materials relating to the history of trans people

Donate a Mask.description: Free delivery of N95 masks and/or COVID rapid tests to individuals, familes, and organizations across Canada

All the Walls Will Fall.description: 2023 Palestinian liberation resource list [curated by the Palestinian Youth Movement]
